Class Reccomendations

java.lang.Object
MyJFrame
Reccomendations
public class Reccomendations extends MyJFrame
Inputs taylor song lyrics and offers reccomendations according to the song.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Reccomendations()
    Initializes and sets temporary text/fonts to all the labels/buttons.

  • Constructor Details

    • Reccomendations

      public Reccomendations()
      Initializes and sets temporary text/fonts to all the labels/buttons. Also adds functionality to the 'enter lyrics' button.

  • Method Details

    • displayInitial

      public void displayInitial()
      Adds all the labels and buttons onto the frame and sets the labels to not currently be visible.

    • displayRecs

      public void displayRecs()
      Checks if the song inputted is by Taylor- if so displays recommendations, if not says that song is not by Taylor. If no song is able to be detected, it says no song detected.

    • parsedID

      public void parsedID(String rawInput)
      Gets the song ID from the the user input and gets the songID, title, and artist from the API.
      Parameters:
      rawInput - user input

    • getSongInfo

      public String getSongInfo(String rawInput)
      Gets the song name and info about the song from the Shazam API.
      Parameters:
      rawInput - user input
      Returns:
      The body of json response containing song info.

    • convertToURL

      public String convertToURL(String rawInput)
      Converts the user input into a url format
      Parameters:
      rawInput - user input
      Returns:
      user input in requested format of API

    • getReccomendations

      public boolean getReccomendations()
      Gets and displays song recs from the API.
      Returns:
      true if recommendations can be found false if otherwise

    • getArtist

      public String getArtist()
      Returns the artist of the song.
      Returns:
      the artist

    • removeBottomElements

      public void removeBottomElements()
      Sets all the labels to be invisible.
